DOC.brief_summary: Tramadol centrally act synthetic analgesic use treat moderate moderately severe pain . It previously evaluate method reduce pain labour , always fear related effect ( neonatal respiratory depression ) . The purpose study evaluate efficacy subcutaneous tramadol regard pain labour , duration labour neonatal outcome .
